docs.snippet: When China closed its local cryptocurrency exchanges late last year, an underground ecosystem of bitcoin "mules" and peer-to-peer platforms sprung up to allow bitcoin trading to thrive, away from regulators' watchful eyes.

headline.print_headline: Asia's Cryptocurrency Arbitrage Boom Fizzles, but Profits Persist
headline.main: Asia's Cryptocurrency Arbitrage Boom Fizzles, but Profits Persist

docs.snippet: The Games will soon descend onto the Gold Coast’s beaches, bringing with it an array of the world’s best athletes, and nagging questions of relevance, competitiveness and economic impact.

headline.main: At the Commonwealth Games, Competing for Medals and Relevance

docs.snippet: We’ll be taking a semi-break from April 2-6 this year, but we’ve left you with many ideas for celebrating the season.
